name: Vegan Vampire
description:
Game for MiniJam 118 Vampires 72 h

Ingles:

Eugene is trapped and needs your help. He has a very rare disease among vampires: blood allergy. That's the reason his father, Count Dracula, exiliated him from the castle and their lands. As a lonely wanderer, Eugene was captured by the family's archienemy: Van Helsing, who hopes to use him as bait and kill his father, the Count. 

After a few days trapped, his blood thirst has arisen. Help him escape before his instinct makes him bite someone and die instantly!

Español

Eugene está atrapado y necesita tu ayuda. Tiene una enfermedad muy extraña entre vampiros: es alérgica a la sangre. Por esto, fue desterrado de las tierras de su padre, el Conde Drácula, y atrapado por la familia Van Helsing, con el objetivo de atraer a su padre y finalmente matarlo. ¡Luego de un par de días en cautiverio, su sed de sangre comienza a aparecer.

 ¡Ayúdalo a escapar antes de que su instinto le haga morder a alguien y muera en el instante!"


Game made by: RamiroUnlam , Lean56 , Rambodev22 , Aqward , Thomas Rivero
